description: You can make this apple rhubarb crumble into individual portions or as one big crumble. Enjoy with a scoop of vanilla ice-cream or a drizzle of cream.
name: Apple & Rhubarb Nut Crumble Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 110 g Lucky Australian toasted sliced almonds

recipeInstructions.text: Pile crumble on top of fruit and bake for 20 minutes. Serve warm with vanilla ice cream.
